body: Your gaze is naturally drawn to valuable glittering objects.
name: Scavenger's Eye
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tengus/New Racial Rules/Tengu Feats/Scavengers Eye

sections.body: You gain a +2 bonus on Appraise checks. You may determine the most valuable item in a hoard as a standard action and gain an additional +2 bonus on the Appraise check to do so. In addition, if you fail an Appraise check by 5 or more, you treat the check as if you had failed by less than 5.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: Determining the most valuable object in a treasure hoard takes 1 full-round action.
sections.name: Normal
